name: Spitter
target_priority: A Spitter randomly picks one target at the start of combat and attacks them until they're dead, then moves on to the next one.
unique_behavior: Spitters always attempt to stay at least 3 hexes away from enemy combatants.

name: Clobber
target_priority: A Clobber randomly picks a target at the start of combat as their target, after which it will go after the character that dealt the highest damage in the last round.
recovery_reactions: [Bloodied] +2 Attack Skill | [Cornered] +5 Attack Skill | [Overwhelmed] -2 Attack Skill

name: Taker
target_priority: The Taker randomly picks a target at the start of combat, who they attempt to drag out of the Combat Grid.

name: Psybane
target_priority: The Psybane will randomly pick a target at the start of each round.
unique_behavior: All characters adjacent to a Psybane suffer 2 Stress per round.

name: Bomber
target_priority: Bombers always target the largest number of characters possible. If it can only hit a single character, it chooses one at random.
unique_behavior: Bombers always attempt to stay at least 3 hexes away from enemy combatants.

name: Cecaelia
target_priority: A Cecaelia randomly picks a target at the start of combat and focuses on it.
